name: A Baby Dino Adventure Run
description:
** 100% FREE! EVERYTHING UNLOCKED! **
** EASY TO PLAY! HOURS OF FUN! **

Go back to the time of dinosaurs! In this fun running and jumping game, you play one of three young baby dinosaurs out to show the older dinos you have what it takes to survive out in the wild.

You wont be able to put this game down! Fun gameplay, cute graphics, and addictive game play!
